sqls.sql: SELECT sr_dlv_h_id, sn_no, part_no, part_name, part_spec, part_unit, part_unit_name, part_idt, mrp_region_no, lot_no, invp_no, invp_name, part_qty, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk1, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk2, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk3, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk4, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk5, sr_dlv_sn_part_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM sr_dlv_sn_part_tmprcv WHERE sr_dlv_sn_part_id = @sr_dlv_sn_part_id;
